pages.text: $(l)Stats$()$(li)Price: Not Sold$(li)Milk: Warped Milk$(li)Milk Cooldown: 10m$(li)Shear drops: Warped Wool$(li)Drops: Warped Wool, Raw Beef, Leather$(br2)$(l)Notes$()$(br)Build a Nether portal in a Warped Forest, and they shall arrive.

pages.name: Warped Wooly Cow
pages.text: Cheese made with its milk is an expensive delicacy.
